name: TXGPRO
description: TXGPRO, a GameFi protocol developed by TRUSTxGAMING: 1. Play-to-Earn Concept: TXGPRO revolves around a "play-to-earn" concept, where gamers can participate in games within the platform using TXGP tokens. By doing so, they can earn cryptocurrency rewards based on their in-game achievements and contributions. This incentivizes gamers to engage with the platform and earn crypto rewards while enjoying their gaming experiences.
